venue.name: Murphy and Scarletti's Pasta, Grill and Bar

item.description:
Join us and the Connecticut Wingman and Wingwoman Group for a co-group Dance, Dance Revolution.
Groove to the hottest sounds while you practice your two-step in preparation for the weekend.
We hear that if you dance long and hard enough your Friday just disappears.

A wise man (or woman) once said: "Dance like nobody's watching; love like you've never been hurt. Sing like nobody's listening; live like it's heaven on earth". For these Thursdays let's make it true ...
Remember what happens a Murphy's, stays at Murphy's ....

(This will be a reoccurring event)

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: DJ Dance Party @ Murphy and Scarletti's
